tool.name: SNP comparator
tool.description: SNP comparator accumulates up SNPs for each genome and in total, it also takes into account how many % wise similar SNPs each tool has in regards to their position. Usage: python snp_comparator.py snp_position_list_from_tool_1.txt snp_position_list_from_tool_2.txt .... sys.argv[1] = comma separated list of SNP formatted lists from genome alignment
